    imagingbook.pub.fd  

    • Uses of FourierDescriptor in imagingbook.pub.fd

      Subclasses of FourierDescriptor in imagingbook.pub.fd 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  FourierDescriptorFromPolygon
      Subclass of FourierDescriptor whose constructors assume that input polygons are non-uniformly sampled.
      class  FourierDescriptorUniform
      Subclass of FourierDescriptor whose constructors assume that input polygons are uniformly sampled.
